subject: math
title: Grade 1 Mathematics
description: Foundation math skills for first grade students

numbers_and_counting.title: Numbers and Counting
numbers_and_counting.description: Learn to count, recognize numbers, and understand quantity

counting_to_10.title: Counting to 10
counting_to_10.learning_objective: Students will be able to count objects from 1 to 10 accurately

counting_to_20.title: Counting to 20
counting_to_20.learning_objective: Students will be able to count objects from 11 to 20 accurately

number_recognition.title: Number Recognition
number_recognition.learning_objective: Students will be able to identify and name numbers 1-20

basic_addition.title: Basic Addition
basic_addition.description: Add two numbers that total 10 or less
basic_addition.learning_objective: Students will be able to add two single-digit numbers with sums up to 10

addition_with_objects.title: Addition with Objects
addition_with_objects.description: Use objects to help add numbers
addition_with_objects.learning_objective: Students will be able to use manipulatives to solve addition problems

addition_word_problems.title: Addition Word Problems
addition_word_problems.learning_objective: Students will be able to solve simple addition word problems

basic_subtraction.title: Basic Subtraction
basic_subtraction.description: Subtract small numbers from 10 or less
basic_subtraction.learning_objective: Students will be able to subtract single-digit numbers from numbers up to 10

subtraction_with_objects.title: Subtraction with Objects
subtraction_with_objects.description: Use objects to help subtract numbers
subtraction_with_objects.learning_objective: Students will be able to use manipulatives to solve subtraction problems

shapes.title: Shapes
shapes.description: Learn about basic shapes and their properties

basic_shapes.title: Basic Shapes
basic_shapes.description: Identify circles, squares, triangles, and rectangles
basic_shapes.learning_objective: Students will be able to identify and name basic geometric shapes

shape_properties.title: Shape Properties
shape_properties.description: Learn about sides and corners of shapes
shape_properties.learning_objective: Students will be able to describe basic properties of shapes
